          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">I lektionssalen - ordkunskap 3</string>
            <string language="en">In lektionssalen - lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In lektionssalen - lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans lektionssalen - le lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em lektionssalen - o lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In lektionssalen - il lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">- Lexicology 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En lektionssalen - el lexicology 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi på ord som har med skolan att göra.Modul 6 - Vad vill du? - Ord och uttryck 3.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, we accustom on words that have with the school to do.

Module 6 - what wants to you? - words and expressions 3.

Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">skola</string>
            <string language="sv">utbildning</string>
            <string language="en">Safir</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">languages</string>
            <string language="en">teach</string>
            <string language="en">education</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier gewöhnen uns wir auf Wörtern, die mit der 
Schule zu do.Module 6 haben - was wünscht zu Ihnen? - Wörter 
und Ausdrücke 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, nous nous accoutumons sur les mots qui ont 
avec l'école à do.Module 6 - ce qui veut à vous ? - mots et 
expressions 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, nós acostumamo-nos nas palavras que têm com
a escola a do.Module 6 - o que quer-lhe? - palavras e 
expressões 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, accustom sulle parole che hanno con la scuola 
a do.Module 6 - che cosa desidera a voi? - parole ed espressioni
3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, accustom στις λέξεις που έχουν με το σχολείο 
κάνουμε την ενότητα 6 - τι θέλει σε σας; - λέξεις και 
εκφράσεις 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí, nos acostumbramos en las palabras que 
tienen con la escuela a do.Module 6 - qué desea a usted? - 
palabras y expresiones 3.Safir.</string>
          </description>
